channel.title: Need Some Help Getting My NPCs to Walk
channel.description:
K the problem is I have no clue how to get my NPCs to walk! I know how to make them and set there location but when ever I try to make them walk they DON'T!!!
Heres an example:
//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2820 3225 3253 0 3226 3254 3224 3252 1 Lumbridge smelter
He just stands there and won't move! If anyone can help me plz do I will make you Admin on my server and give you 700mil. Plzz plzz plzz plzz plzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz! :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 09:05:36 PM[/size][hr]Cmon Cmon Help meeeeeeeee... Or I will die :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 10, 2007, 12:33:27 AM[/size][hr]CMON HELP MEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE!!!!

item.title: Need Some Help Getting My NPCs to Walk
item.dc:creator: @Lol_zezima_died Lol zezima died
item.description:
@Lol_zezima_died wrote:

Did you try making the walk type 2?

Other than that I don’t know.

I’m trying to figure that out, too

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 2820 3225 3253 0 3226 3254 3224 3252 1 Lumbridge smelter

Try changing the “1” in the walk type to “2”

so it would look like this:

//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 2820 3225 3253 0 3226 3254 3224 3252 2 Lumbridge smelter
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2008, 03:38:27 PM[/size][hr]Also, the coordinates go like this:

The North-east corner goes first

Then the south-west corner goes last

So if I wanted a cow to move around in the cow pin in lumbridge, I’d put this:

spawn = 81 3260 3260 0 3259 3257 3264 3268 2 Cow
NOTE: not real coordinates (at least I think)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 16, 2008, 11:01:48 PM[/size][hr]Also, make sure you put walk-type to 2 ;D

I also made a post on this

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic
item.source: Need Some Help Getting My NPCs to Walk
